overview: Jigs and Sherman are terribly in love with each other. They share a home together, and live the life of a committed couple. But Jigs has fantasies of introducing a third party to their blissful little arrangement. And when their teenage neighbor Kiko shows interest, Jigs tests the waters. The couple eventually succumbs to temptation, and a rift grows between Jigs and Sherman. Jealousy threatens to tear the two apart as they tangle with the affections of their new teenage lover.
title: Adam's Apple: Kakagat ka ba?
